headline: Southwest Airlines (LUV): Among Paul Singer’s Latest Portfolio’s Top Stock Picks
summary: We recently published a list of Paul Singer’s Latest Portfolio: Top 10 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Southwest Airlines Co. headline: MSG, Southwest Airlines, ProAssurance: Market Minute
summary: Yahoo Finance host Julie Hyman catches investors up on the top stock market stories in this Market Minute, including Madison Square Garden's (MSGS) stock gains after the sale of the Boston Celtics NBA franchise, Southwest Airlines (LUV) receives upgrades from UBS and Melius analysts, and the Doctors Company's deal to take ProAssurance (PRA) private. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Southwest Airlines 'meaningful changes support improvement'
summary: Investing.com -- UBS upgraded Southwest Airlines (NYSE:LUV) from Sell to Neutral this week, citing the airline’s “whatever it takes” approach to driving financial improvement.

headline: Frontier Airlines makes a play for customers upset by Southwest’s bag policy
summary: “We’ve always had heart. Some airlines are walking away from what travelers love, but we’re running towards it,” CEO Barry Biffle said.

headline: Airline Stocks Are Burning Investors. It’s Not the First Time.
summary: Airline stocks soared 95% from their August low through their January high. They have since tumbled on a spate of bad news.
